mapper.select: SELECT E.NAME AS STORENAME, A.ID AS PRODUCT_ID, A.NAME AS PRODUCTNAME , A.PRICESELL AS PRICE , A.TEXTTIP AS VALID, C.NAME AS CATEGORY, (A.STOCKVOLUME + B.UNITS) AS STOCK, (CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 > 360 THEN A.PRICESELL WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 60 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.5 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 120 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.6 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 180 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.7 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 240 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.8 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 300 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.85 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 360 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.9 END) AS DISCOUNTPRICE, A.IMAGE AS IMAGE FROM PRODUCTS A JOIN STOCKCURRENT B ON(A.ID = B.PRODUCT) JOIN CATEGORIES C ON(A.CATEGORY = C.ID) JOIN LOCATIONS E ON(E.ID = B.LOCATION)
